sourceDesc.p: Transcription reprinted by Ian St George in eColenso May 2015 Supplement, available at http://www.colensostudy.id.au/Newsletters/eCol%205%20May15%20supplement.pdf
Encoded into TEI by Jamie Norrish, 17.11.15

body.p: I have some Piripiri growing in my coast run at Akitio and I am endeavouring to find out what kind of grass or clover will be the best to conquer it. From your knowledge of botany I daresay you would be able to tell me.
In consequence of the burr I was compelled to shear very early this year which causes a loss in the weight of wool. I am told Nairnâ€™s run is very bad with it.
